SELECT menu_id, parent_menu_id, menu_type, menu_name, product_package_id, sort, path, component, query, external_link_flag, cache_flag, visible_flag, permission_code, icon, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM menu WHERE menu_id=#{menuId} and delete_flag=0

SELECT distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_menu_id, m.menu_type, m.menu_name, m.product_package_id, m.sort, m.path, m.component, m.query, m.external_link_flag, m.cache_flag, m.visible_flag, m.permission_code, m.icon, m.status, m.delete_flag, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time FROM menu m LEFT JOIN product_package pp on pp.product_package_id = m.product_package_id WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND ( pp.product_package_id is null OR pp.delete_flag = 0) AND m.status = 1 AND m.menu_type IN (1,2) ORDER BY m.parent_menu_id, m.sort

SELECT distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_menu_id, m.menu_type, m.menu_name, m.product_package_id, m.sort, m.path, m.component, m.query, m.external_link_flag, m.cache_flag, m.visible_flag, m.permission_code, m.icon, m.status, m.delete_flag, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time FROM menu m LEFT JOIN role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id AND rm.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id AND ur.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id LEFT JOIN product_package pp on pp.product_package_id = m.product_package_id WHERE m.delete_flag = 0 AND ( pp.product_package_id is null OR pp.delete_flag = 0) AND m.status = 1 AND m.menu_type IN (1,2) AND ro.status = 1 AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.parent_menu_id, m.sort
